programme.title: JAG: Defending His Honor
programme.desc: An ambulance pulls up to a crash site where a woman, Jennifer Wilson, is found injured and crying for her baby. Unbeknownst to her, the six-month-old baby died in the accident. A Navy judge stands accused of vehicular homicide.(n)

programme.title: JAG: In Country
programme.desc: Central Command coordinates an airstrike on a confirmed target traveling through Afghanistan. After the strike is launched, marine troops assess the damage and they are disturbed to learn that they targeted the wrong vehicle and hit civilians instead.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Enemy Below
programme.desc: Kabir is preparing an attack against the U.S. and was last seen crossing the border from Afghanistan to Iran. He is believed to have recruited Capt. Yerastov, a Russian submarine captain. Turner, Harm and Mac help in the hunt for the terrorists.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Critical Condition
programme.desc: Bud has lost his right lower leg due to a mine in Afghanistan; during emergency surgery he faces bad trouble. Sturgis returns to Washington, and Harm and Mac disobey an order from the admiral. Bud encounters an astounding change of course.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Dangerous Game
programme.desc: A deputy sheriff dies while chasing a car carrying two SEALs in a Navy exercise. The driver stands trial for negligent homicide.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Rogue Element
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must help protect Cabe's ex-wife after she uncovers evidence that suggests foul play in the death of a prominent congressman.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Talismans
programme.desc: When a military plane is shot down in Bosnia, Team Scorpion must help recover its stealth technology before it falls into enemy hands.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Revenge
programme.desc: When Sylvester accidentally triggers an explosive device during an investigation, Team Scorpion must focus on finding who's responsible even while their friend's life hangs in the balance.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Dominoes
programme.desc: As Christmas approaches, Team Scorpion races to find a way to save a young boy's life after he gets trapped in a beachside cave and drowning is imminent.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Kill Screen
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must help Ralph when the FBI questions him after his dark web game play inadvertently reveals the location of a CIA safe house and results in the murder of CIA operatives.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Charades
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is tasked with uncovering a mole inside the CIA whose judgment is clouded by matters of the heart and is being coerced into stealing deadly chemicals.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Letting Go
programme.desc: When Nick’s estranged older brother emerges with new information on someone from their tragic past, Nick goes off the grid to track the man down. But Juliet is hot on his heels, and Nick is forced to let her into the secrets of his past.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: A Real Gentleman
programme.desc: When Traci is a no-show for her first raid, 15 Division fears the notorious gun dealer they’re after has kidnapped her. But when Andy realizes that the serial rapist we never caught is back, it’s all hands on deck to find Traci.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Home Run
programme.desc: After a community-outreach baseball game erupts in a drive-by shooting, Gail’s relationship with her brother is put to the test . Meanwhile, Swarek plans a getaway with Andy up to Oliver’s cabin, which goes off the rails in every possible way.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Best Man
programme.desc: Andy and Sam are shocked to learn that Oliver is the prime suspect in IA’s corruption investigation into 15 Division. They only have until end of day today to find Chris Klem – the missing explosives-dealer – and clear Oliver’s name.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Integrity Test
programme.desc: With Oliver still the prime suspect in the bombing of 15’s evidence room, Andy, Dov, Gail, and Nick undertake a risky – and potentially career-ending – plan to prove that Commissioner Alonso Santana is corrupt.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Ninety Degrees
programme.desc: Andy heads out with a very-pregnant Marlo to find a volatile woman who’s gone missing after group therapy, but neither Andy nor Marlo are prepared when Marlo suddenly goes into labor.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Tired from this long investigation, the team continue where one of them realises that the idea to investigate along was a mistake, but can the others get there in time. And something has a final message for the team as they leave.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: The Most Haunted team visit this deserted old mansion which is way past its original splendour. They are soon surrounded by unexplained activity as something is following them and for at least two members of crew, they are pushed to their very limits.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: SECRET LOCATION PT1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding leads team in a violent, secret investigation. Place's name and location concealed due to extreme haunting. Little history, aggressive entities a mystery. Can they reveal the darkness and face the unknown?(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: SECRET LOCATION PT2
programme.desc: Most Haunted's deadliest investigation, Part 2. Spirits emerging, team's resolve tested as darkness envelops. Growing fear, team's safety at stake. Can they continue?(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Roasts and Ghosts
programme.desc: The TAPS team is the first paranormal team to ever investigate the famed Friar's Club in New York City. Next, the team travels to the Main Street Armory in Rochester, New York.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Edith Wharton Estate
programme.desc: TAPS is the first team to investigate The Mount in Lenox, MA, the astounding estate of famous author Edith Wharton.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Membership Denied
programme.desc: TAPS is called out to Hartford, CT to Elks Lodge, the oldest and largest secret fraternal organizations in the country. Elks Lodge #19 is shrouded in mystery and tragedy with a gruesome death hanging over its head....and decades of paranormal activity.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Oldest House In Georgia
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS starts out at the Ulster County Jail in Kingston, NY, where inmates and personal have both witnessed activity.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Princess and the EVP
programme.desc: The final day has arrived –it's Grant's last investigation with TAPS. And where better to close out his phenomenal run but at Jason and Grant's very own haunted property, Spalding Inn, located in Whitefield, New Hampshire.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Things We Cannot Change
programme.desc: A black hole knocks out Dylan and sends him into an alternative reality with a wife and child.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Fair Unknown
programme.desc: The crew rescues one of the long-lost founders of the Commonwealth, but discovers she may be more trouble than she is worth.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Belly of the Beast
programme.desc: A mythological space monster tries to eat the Andromeda.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Knight, Death and the Devil
programme.sub-title: The Knight, Death and the Devil
programme.desc: Dylan attempts to liberate a fleet of captured ships, but the fleet isn't sure it wants to be liberated. Their AIs fear that new captains will enslave them.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Immaculate Perception
programme.desc: Genites attack Tyr's wife and colony.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.178
programme.desc: Two women fight at a Halloween party over wearing the same costume, disputing their relationship with the Sheriff’s department. A woman crashes her co-worker's car into oncoming traffic, admitting she was driving without a license.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.218
programme.desc: A man is allegedly chased out of a bar and viciously attacked after being accused of stealing a woman’s purse.\t\t\t\r\nA man hits black ice and has a wreck in his brother’s ex-girlfriend’s car; she sues him for damages.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.137
programme.desc: Alleged assault, vandalism, and marijuana use are the source of\t\t\t\r\ncontention between a woman and her nephew’s ex-girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.1
programme.desc: A month after meeting online, unwed parents decide to live together but then fight over cross-country moving expenses/Judge Judy asks if a man will remove and hand over one of his diamond earrings to pay a single mother back for an alleged loan.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.93
programme.desc: Man sues ex-girlfriend for car loan and carpet cleaner return; she alleges jealousy. Woman claims ex-lover's drug addiction led to eviction; he sues for furniture and electronic equipment return.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.79
programme.desc: A teenager puts his father in a choke-hold to demonstrate how he allegedly assaulted another boy at school who passed out cold and is suing for medical expenses/Two young women accuse an ex-friend of breaking their door down.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.234
programme.desc: A man's family visit turns sour as he and the child's mother argue over a hairbrush. High school friends living together feud over rent, bills, and a trip.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.162
programme.desc: Teen sues ex-friend for burns and stolen laptop, countersued for harassment. Adult entertainment sued for refund after male dancers disrupt birthday party.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.47
programme.desc: A woman’s finger is broken after an argument at a party over alleged cocaine use; she claims she was pushed down the stairs by her roommate/Arrested as a result of bouncing two checks, a man sues a former friend who gave them to him.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.100
programme.desc: An economic stimulus check is allegedly stolen by a woman’s ex- husband/A woman is suing her ex-boyfriend for an unpaid loan to help him flip a house and for an unpaid parking ticket.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.129
programme.desc: Prohibited confetti poppers at school cause serious injury; parents and teens dispute liability/Man sues granddaughter's boyfriend for cashing fraudulent check in relative's bank account.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Legal Repossession
programme.desc: First, Matt, Froy, and Lou do a legal repossession of an attorney's car. Next, Froy, Lyndah, and Sonia are speechless when they interrupt two girls in the back of a car. And finally, Lou and Sonia wrangle with a bunch of confused ATV owners blindsided by.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Business Issues
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Lou deal with a terrible boss and his instigating employees. Next, Lou, Froy, and Lyndah deal with a debtor with issues when they take possession of a taco truck. And Finally, Matt, Lou, and Sonia take on a big repo at a dealership and...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Wrench in the Works
programme.desc: First, a wrench is thrown in the works, and at the car, when Froy and Matt try to repo from a plumber. Then, the duo goes out again to try to repo a car from a slap-happy debtor, but unfortunately, the car has a boot on it. And finally, Froy, Matt, Lyndah.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Hidden Cars and Higher Powers
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy get some help from a friendly gardener that leads them to discover a car hidden in the backyard. Next, Matt and Froy go on another repo to repossess from a preacher that believes it would be blasphemy to repo his car.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Rolling Away
programme.desc: First, Lou, Sonia, and Froy have to push away a debtor while trying to push a classic car up a hill and onto the flatbed. And later, Matt and Froy head out on a repo for a BMW, but when the camera guy refuses to leave the car and Matt's lunch starts to...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Matt's Back
programme.desc: Froy and Mike, the new guy, repo a car at a paintball range. When the scene gets out of control, Matt swoops in out of nowhere and saves the day. Then, Sonia and Froy repo a high-end luxury sedan from a snooty pair of Brits in the high-rent district.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Burgers, Bottles, and Hustlers
programme.desc: Lou and Sonia repo a compact sedan from a trio of gun-wielding, bottle-breaking gangsta gals. Then, Matt and Froy get some fast food when they deal with an irate burger-slinger who won't honor Matt's order for his car.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Strapped on the Court
programme.desc: Matt and Froy have to choose between the job and their lives when they're confronted by a dozen gun-toting basketball players. Then, Lou and Sonia have to crash a night-time family reunion to get their car.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Role-players and Blade Swayers
programme.desc: Lou, Matt, and Froy get interrupted on a routine job by a registered owner with an unregistered blade. Then, Matt and Froy head out to the country to reclaim a Prius from a quintet of socially maladapted role-players.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Caught with Their Pants Down
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy's relationship takes a strange turn on a repo that puts them face-to-face with two strangers caught with their pants down. Then, Lou and Lyndah head to a remote ranch where they confront a duo of indecent roughnecks.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Old School Jeff
programme.desc: Jeff is given an opportunity to 'live it up' during a night out on the town, landing Russell in hot water and Adam to reflect on the details surrounding his impending nuptials.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fix-Ups and Downs
programme.desc: Jennifer and Audrey practice their match-making skills and inadvertently end up date-less while Adam and Jeff score financial gain in the process. Meanwhile, Russell tries a new tactic at 'fixing himself up.'.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Visit from Fay
programme.desc: A visit from Adam's free-spirited mother puts Jennifer's patience to the test and teaches Russell an embarrassing lesson about 'art'. Meanwhile, Jeff and Audrey find themselves enjoying alternative forms of entertainment.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Time Share
programme.desc: Jeff makes plans to take Audrey away for the weekend to a fancy hotel, even though they’ll have to sit through a time share presentation to get a great deal.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jen at Work
programme.desc: Adam suggests that Jen do some freelance graphic design work for the company but Russell isn't crazy about the idea.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Optimal Male
programme.desc: Jeff's drive to be labeled an 'optimal male' on his life-insurance physical leads him to some extreme behavior, while Adam's over-friendliness with an ex-girlfriend unsettles Jennifer.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Russell's Father's Son
programme.desc: Russell puts on a show to impress his father when he comes to town, but both he and Adam learn the meaning of a parent's tough love. Meanwhile, an 'accident' in their apartment forces Adam and Jennifer to invade Audrey and Jeff's bathroom.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Buyer's Remorse
programme.desc: Jennifer and Adam attempt to practice fiscal responsibility as they consider buying their apartment. Audrey and Jeff offer to write their letter of recommendation, but end up making matters worse when they have a run-in with the landlady.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Pimp My Bride
programme.desc: Russell reluctantly agrees to host a photo shoot in his apartment for Audrey's magazine, with the hope of landing a date with a hot model. Adam steps in to play the groom in Audrey's wedding-themed shoot.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff’s New Friend
programme.desc: Jeff is surprised when Audrey informs him that the new friend he made at the gym is gay. Meanwhile, Russell worries the young woman he's dating might be his daughter.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Voluntary Commitment
programme.desc: After a long line of female assistants, Russell learns that having a male assistant can be very advantageous. Meanwhile, after volunteering to read to the elderly, Audrey makes a bet with Jeff that she can commit to finishing a project.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Ice in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog and his team fight the war on ice-crystal methamphetamine-on many fronts. They appear on a special anti-drug float in a parade. Then they go after bail-jumping Pana, a convicted drug dealer.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fathers in Law
programme.desc: Hunting down a fugitive known as "Bozo," Dog gets help from an unexpected source, Bozo's father-in-law.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bosco the Clown
programme.desc: Dog and the team get a big surprise after they track down Bosco, a fugitive who they believe is addicted to methamphetamines. They discover he's off drugs, settling into a normal life with a new girlfriend, and is very friendly.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Leland has a full plate of fugitives in Kona, and the whole family heads to the Big Island to help.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mama's Boys
programme.desc: Dog visits his mother's grave for inspiration before heading out to find Frankie, a violent fugitive hiding in the jungle. The spirit of Ma Chapman seems to help when Dog finds an unusual ally; Frankie's mother.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Lost in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog lectures high school students about the dangers of drugs before going after Joseph, a dangerous fugitive who won't be easy to capture.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Coaching Day
programme.desc: Dog takes the day off to try his hand at coaching, and assigns Tim and Leland to track down a dangerous fugitive on their own. Can the boys prove they can handle it?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Women of Waikiki
programme.desc: The boys get distracted by the bikini-clad lovelies on Waikiki when they hunt for Lucy, a homeless, alcoholic fugitive. Beth is amused by the boys, but this is serious business: Tim will have to pay the bond if Lucy isn't caught.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Capture One's Own
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law, and now Dog must bring her in.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Bags and Boxers
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is goes to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bosco the Clown
programme.desc: Dog and the team get a big surprise after they track down Bosco, a fugitive who they believe is addicted to methamphetamines. They discover he's off drugs, settling into a normal life with a new girlfriend, and is very friendly.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Leland has a full plate of fugitives in Kona, and the whole family heads to the Big Island to help.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mama's Boys
programme.desc: Dog visits his mother's grave for inspiration before heading out to find Frankie, a violent fugitive hiding in the jungle. The spirit of Ma Chapman seems to help when Dog finds an unusual ally; Frankie's mother.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Lost in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog lectures high school students about the dangers of drugs before going after Joseph, a dangerous fugitive who won't be easy to capture.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Coaching Day
programme.desc: Dog takes the day off to try his hand at coaching, and assigns Tim and Leland to track down a dangerous fugitive on their own. Can the boys prove they can handle it?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Women of Waikiki
programme.desc: The boys get distracted by the bikini-clad lovelies on Waikiki when they hunt for Lucy, a homeless, alcoholic fugitive. Beth is amused by the boys, but this is serious business: Tim will have to pay the bond if Lucy isn't caught.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Capture One's Own
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law, and now Dog must bring her in.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Bags and Boxers
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is goes to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Ice in Paradise

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hands on a Woodchipper
programme.desc: When Willie agrees to sponsor Mountain Man's radio contest, a "Hands on a Hardbody" competition, he somehow finds himself competing against Si for Mountain Man's last minute prize: a woodchipper.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack Draft
programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day. Meanwhile, Phil and Si accompany Miss Kay on a trip to visit a family grave.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Brand of Brothers
programme.desc: When Willie contemplates re-branding the Duck Commander image, Jase takes issue with having an outsider design their image, so he and the guys create their own new logo and business cards. Meanwhile, Willie and Phil help Bella with her science project.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: De-Bug Life
programme.desc: The guys realize it is time for the annual cleaning of the duck blinds when they come across a gator using one as a home. Meanwhile, while the kids are running the church car wash, Si and Willie disagree on the best way to draw in customers.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Men vs. Wild
programme.desc: Brotherly competition is taken to a whole new level when Jase and Willie challenge Alan and Jep to a survival race through the woods on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Si is interested in finding a new hobby when he sees Kay cutting coupons.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Return of the Beavers
programme.desc: When Phil discovers more beaver activity on the Robertson land, he recruits Jase, Jep, and Si to get rid of them. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie bring Bella to her first day of karate practice.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Stumped on a way to celebrate Willie's birthday, Korie enlists the guys' help and Jase takes the reigns in planning a trip to the lake where Phil and Kay used to live. Meanwhile, the women realize a raccoon is inside the lake house.(n)

programme.desc: In 1920s Vienna, lonely Mary receives a nutcracker doll from her Uncle Albert. On Christmas Eve, her imagination brings it to life as "NC," leading her on a perilous journey against the Rat King's plot to overthrow humanity.(n)

programme.desc: A young girl and her coach overcome adversity to make their way into the National Australian Gymnastics Squad.(n)

programme.desc: A group posing as volunteers attacks using a stolen skrill prototype that does not require an implant to control. It is discovered that the skrill queen is also missing. The investigation leads to a resistance group called Black Wednesday.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Sanctuary for None Pt 1
programme.desc: When the Sanctuary is approached by an abnormal leader about a radical plan for peace, Magnus goes all in and pledges her full support. However, when Will is forced to leave the Sanctuary, his decision may just put everyone at risk.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Sanctuary for None Pt 2
programme.desc: SCIU has surrounded the 5th Ward with troops and an electric shield that prevents them from leaving. Caleb has a virus that can turn the human population into abnormals. Magnus enacts her ultimate plan for the Sanctuary network.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Sanctuary For All Pt 1
programme.desc: The enigmatic Dr. Helen Magnus recruits an insightful forensic psychiatrist Will Zimmerman (ROBIN DUNNE) to join her in the quest to track, study and protect the strange, and often terrifying creatures that secretly populate our world. Part 1.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Sanctuary For All Pt 2
programme.desc: The enigmatic Dr. Helen Magnus recruits an insightful forensic psychiatrist Will Zimmerman (ROBIN DUNNE) to join her in the quest to track, study and protect the strange, and often terrifying creatures that secretly populate our world. Part 2.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Fata Morgana
programme.desc: Dr. Helen Magnus, her daughter Ashley, and new to the Sanctuary, Dr. Will Zimmerman release three women from a mysterious crypt in Scotland, bringing them back to the Sanctuary for refuge.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Disco and Dice
programme.desc: 1978 Williams Disco pinball machine; 1898 dice popper gambling device; talking 1990s bar top breathalyzer; deadly fishing harpoon.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Real Thing
programme.desc: Allen and Ton compete with a notorious deep-pocketed bidder in Oxnard, CA, and score a vintage Coca-Cola vending machine, a vintage desk and a rare 1971 GMC truck.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fake Punt Payoff
programme.desc: Ton and Allen contend with a large crowd of inexperienced auction-buyers at a huge storage container auction in Pasadena. They find a small fleet of Segway personal transporters and an enormous custom-made shotgun.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hula Moola
programme.desc: Ton and Allen jet to the Hawaiian islands where they're joined by a feisty new female assistant! The team uncovers a pair of James Bond-style gadgets designed for high-speed underwater travel and a vintage sled.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Jersey Score
programme.desc: Ton & Allen attend a silent auction in NJ, but that doesn't stop the local buyers from letting them know they're not welcome! They uncover a skeet throwing machine from the 1960's & a vintage vehicle with some real horsepower!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hot Wheels
programme.desc: '70s sand rail dune racer with rally hemi heads; 1965 replica Mustang pool table; off-road racing gear.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Friends in Hawaii Places
programme.desc: Allen &Ton enlist an assistant, Carolyn, and Allen's Hawaiian buddy, Junior, to help them battle local buyers. The guys find a WWII-era motor scooter and a stash of antique Polynesian tattoo tools that get used on Ton!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Voodoo Moola
programme.desc: Allen & Ton hit a storage auction in Louisiana's Capitol City and quickly find themselves in trouble with the law! The guys uncover a pair of racing lawnmowers and then stumble on an antique barber chair from the early 1900s!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Drumming Up Cash
programme.desc: Ton & Allen face some silent but deadly competition at an auction in nearby Glendale. They discover a Zildjian brand percussion cymbal from the 1940's and a pyrotechnics control board designed for large-scale fireworks displays!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Quadzilla Attacks!
programme.desc: Extreme Quadzilla ATV, the fastest 4 wheeler ever; a 1910s Remington Derringer and an 1880s Palm Squeezer pistol; revolutionary 1800s Western Electric telephone with a crank dial.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Dead Aim
programme.desc: Ton & Allen face-off against an auction buyer with shady bidding tactics and even more questionable fashion sense. The guys find a custom-built monowheel & a rifle designed to ward off grave robbers in the early 19th century!(n)
